Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii


Hi,

I am trying to run H3-beta using the 'r' commandLine option.
I am prompted with this message - "You must specify a password for the web interface using -a."

The content of my heritrix_out.log
**************
Tue Oct 20 09:12:11 EDT 2009 Starting heritrix
Linux myServerName 2.6.22-16-generic #1 SMP Thu Apr 2 00:49:08 GMT 2009 x86_64 GNU/Linux
java version "1.6.0_03"
Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 1.6.0_03-b05)
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 1.6.0_03-b05, mixed mode)
JAVA_OPTS=-Xmx256m
core file size          (blocks, -c) 0
data seg size           (kbytes, -d) unlimited
scheduling priority             (-e) 0
file size               (blocks, -f) unlimited
pending signals                 (-i) 32255
max locked memory       (kbytes, -l) 32
max memory size         (kbytes, -m) unlimited
open files                      (-n) 1024
pipe size            (512 bytes, -p) 8
POSIX message queues     (bytes, -q) 819200
real-time priority              (-r) 0
stack size              (kbytes, -s) 8192
cpu time               (seconds, -t) unlimited
max user processes              (-u) 32255
virtual memory          (kbytes, -v) unlimited
file locks                      (-x) unlimited
You must specify a password for the web interface using -a.

***********************
Is this an issue?

Of course I am able to run it in web-ui-admin mode.

Thanks,
Pranay
